title: Create a Seasonal Promotion
description: A marketing manager wants to create a 'Summer Getaway' package that includes a discounted room rate and a breakfast credit.

tasks.description: Define the parameters of the promotion: name, valid dates, discount percentage, and included value-adds.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager defines all aspects of the new package.

tasks.description: Create a new rate code and package in the PMS with these parameters.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new promotional package is successfully built in the system.

tasks.description: Make the new promotion available for booking on the hotel's website.
tasks.expected_outcome: The promotion is activated and visible on the public booking engine.
